structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY-COUNTY METROPOLITAN SEWER, SEWER CONSTRUCTION, AND SANITATION DISTRICTS

law.history: Repealed 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 1. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 60, sec. 1(13) and (14).

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Apportionment of cost of assessment -- Notice to property owners -- Payment of assessment.
